{{Infobox dungeon |name = Pokémon Tower |image = [[File:Pokemon Tower.png]] |caption = An overhead map of the Pokemon Tower. |tokens = 750 |location = West of Lavender Town }} '''Pokemon Tower''' is a dungeon in [[Kanto]].
==Details==

{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 7,523 |- | Boss || 37,615 |}

* Gastly * Haunter * Cubone * Marowak (boss)
